# Dadwal Garage
> Trusted car garage and mechanic in Coventry

## About
Dadwal Garage is one of Coventry's highest-rated independent garages, with 715 Google reviews at 4.9 stars. Run by Waheed, known for honest pricing, fast turnaround, and a welcoming reception where customers can relax with tea and coffee while their car is being worked on.

## Contact
- Phone: 07943 025557
- Area: Coventry CV6 5HE and surrounding areas
- Website listed on [TradeHub](https://tradehub.directory/trades/dadwal-garage)

## Services
- Car repairs & servicing
- MOT preparation
- Brake repairs
- Electrical fault diagnosis
- Headlight restoration
- Engine diagnostics
